GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v6.0.13
GSD.description:
can: af_can: fix NULL pointer dereference in can_rcv_filter

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit fcc63f2f7ee3038d53216edd0d8291e57c752557, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 4e096a18867a5a989b510f6999d9c6b6622e8f7b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: can: af_can: fix NULL pointer dereference in can_rcv_filter
